name: Dragon Teeth Bracelet [2]
description: Dragon teeth bracelet, with a magical skill that enables user to share beast's power.

name: Dragon Vest
description: A underwear made from dragon bristles.

name: Dragon Vest [1]
description: A underwear made from dragon bristles.

name: Dragon Will
description: The general Lee Ake, working for the tyrant Schmitz, killed the cloned person of the famous Dragon King Nieder Hoge with this gun. Then he renamed this gun "Dragon Will" which later on is known as the "Dragon Gun" spread around the world. (Better used as the weapon skin)

name: Dragon Wing [2]
description: The bow in the shape of dragons' wings is said to be made from the bones of dragons, giving the dragon clan the fatal power.

name: Dragon Wing [3]
description: The bow in the shape of dragons' wings is said to be made from the bones of dragons, giving the dragon clan the fatal power.

name: Dream of Whale
description: A wizard music record. With it, You can order songs in the music box spot newly designed by Kafra. [A whale dreaming of the sea and the sky.]

name: Dreamer's Dream
description: A wizard music record. With it, You can order songs in the music box spot newly designed by Kafra. [The spirit of the man who once craved for the world's biggest diamond is lingering there. Even if his stone was carried across the sea, the curse still surrounds it.]

description: Use it and get the Dreams of Sunrise·Black beauty contact lens from the Beauty of Eyes in Prontera.
